name: UHD Clean
description:
Modernizes UI with:
- Clearer color distinctions
- Far less padding
- No Adds
- No social links
- No superfluous instructions on how to use a browser
- No super-slow fade-in

Adds:
- Hover states to thumbnails
- Larger previews
- Clearly marked download links
- Reduced header size
- More prominent Headlines and clearer text.
additional_info:
Removed new ads.
Added styling for result count.
Removed spam from fullsize image view.
Fixed Download Links.
